text:
@brianstelter @Yamiche @PressSec kayleigh, you're just as slippery as your "big boss," who is working so diligently to solve the Coronavirus crisis.
BTW: Where his your empathy (or even acknowledgement of disease numbers or deaths), when you trot out ln fox noise!
